Arabic.Name: القدر
Lines: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ
تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ

English.Name: Al-Qadr
Lines: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree
And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree
The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months
The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter
Peace it is until the emergence of dawn

Turkish.Name: KADİR
Lines: İyiliği sonsuz, ikramı bol Allah’ın adıyla,
Kadir gecesi nedir, sen nereden bileceksin?
O gece melekler,Rablerinin her bir konuda onayladığı görevlerle (ruhlarla)[*] inerler.
